ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This class made me love neorealism-- therefore I would recommend it to anyone.
I would recommend it as an excellent introduction to and exploration of Italian Neorealism.

Definitely recommend taking this course. Particularly for someone who wants to try out film studies. As a Slavic LAnguages and Literature PhD student, I am looking for a minor field and this course in many ways solidified my determination to minor in film.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Absolutely necessary for Italian students, as many of the courses are required viewing for qualifying exams.
Neorealism is crucial for any italianist.
